title: Buffalo Mass Shooting Victims' Families Sue Meta, Reddit, Amazon
description: The families of victims of a mass shooting in Buffalo are challenging the platforms they believe led the attacker to carry out a racist massacre.

title: More Penguins Than Europeans Can Use Google Bard
description: Nobody in the EU can access Google’s Bard chatbot. But the 50,000 penguins who live on a dormant volcano in the South Atlantic can sign up right now.
